thread.title: CYNTHIA

author: CYNTHIA
title: CYNTHIA
text: This is my second time using IDriveSafely to get an adult drivers-ed certificate. It definitely got the job done, but toward the end it began to get a little repetitive. Maybe an update on the modules with something fresh and engaging would keep many viewers interested on the content. I finished it on my own time, which was great. Overall, I don't have any regrets about purchasing their service a second time.
